verbs.description: A simple truth [V: is] coming into focus : to associate with Donald Trump is to do permanent harm to your reputation .
[ARG1: A simple truth] is [V: coming] [ARG2: into focus] : to associate with Donald Trump is to do permanent harm to your reputation .
A simple truth is coming into focus : to [V: associate] [ARG2: with Donald Trump] is to do permanent harm to your reputation .
A simple truth is coming into focus : [ARG1: to associate with Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: to do permanent harm to your reputation] .
A simple truth is coming into focus : to associate with Donald Trump is to [V: do] [ARG1: permanent harm] [ARG2: to your reputation] .
